short_summary: Acquisition of airborne topographic LiDAR data and aerial orthophotos.
description: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking proposals from bidders to accessprofessional services for the acquisition, classification and inspection of classification ofairborne topographic LiDAR (Light Detection and Ranging), an airborne technology thatuses a pulsed laser light that is emitted towards the Earth’s surface, and then reflectedback to the sensor and for the acquisition of aerial orthophotos in support to LiDAR.

full_summary:
**Title**: Work related to airborne topographic LiDAR data
===========================

**Tender Reference**: PW-23-01020004
**Solicitation Number**: NRCan-5000045352/D-001

**Notice Type**: Competitive tender for a Supply Arrangement
**Procurement Category**: Services
**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Eligibility**: All eligible suppliers are invited to apply.
**Posting Date**: January 4, 2023
**Closing Date**: February 3, 2023, at 2:00 pm EST

**Description**: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites proposals to access professional services for the acquisition, classification, and inspection of airborne topographic LiDAR data and aerial orthophotos. Suppliers can qualify for four (4) work categories:

* Acquisition of airborne topographic LiDAR data
* Classification of airborne topographic LiDAR data
* Acquisition of aerial orthophotos in support to the LiDAR data
* Inspection of classification of existing airborne topographic LiDAR data

**Contact Information**:

* Marie-Josée Michaud, Natural Resources Canada, [marie-josee.michaud@canada.ca](mailto:marie-josee.michaud@canada.ca), 418-563-6912
* Address: 1055, rue du P.E.P.S., Québec, QC G1V 4C7, Canada

**Tender Documents**: The tender documents are available online at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/04/0dfeabacdd563fd3940db7dffbd8454d/rfsarncan-5000045352d.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/04/0dfeabacdd563fd3940db7dffbd8454d/rfsarncan-5000045352d.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/05/d10f290ae5fcb04036d9c6078d1c2571/rfsa_rncan-5000045352d-001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/05/d10f290ae5fcb040
